pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Random Samples from the Polya-Gamma Distribution // Generates random samples from the Polya-Gamma distribution using an implementation of the algorithm described in J. Windle's PhD thesis (2013) https://repositories.lib.utexas.edu/ bitstream/handle/2152/21842/WINDLE-DISSERTATION-2013.pdf. The underlying implementation is in C.
